description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pork Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast pork,Orange,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Pork,Peanut free
name: Roast Pork Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs orange, zest grated (save 1 tbs grated orange zest extra)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine garlic, celery salt, mustard, marmalade, zest, juice, oil and black pepper in a bowl. Brush over pork, then cover and marinate in fridge for 2-3 hours.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place pork chops and orange slices in a baking dish and cover with foil. Bake for 10 minutes, then remove foil and bake for a further 10-15 minutes or until pork is cooked through. Serve with your choice of salad or vegetables.
